events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will begin reviewing your credentials shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department as a software developer role, matching your skills and experience.
A dedicated recruiter from our engineering hiring team has been assigned to handle your application and guide you through the process.
You successfully passed the initial screening stage. Your experience with software development and DevOps practices stood out to us.
Thank you for promptly responding and confirming your availability for the next steps in our engineering recruitment process.
We have scheduled your technical interview for the software engineer role on May 20th at 10:00 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly.
You completed the technical interview with our development team. Your coding skills and problem-solving approach were impressive.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 25th at 2:00 PM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career goals.
The HR interview went well. You expressed alignment with our company values and a strong enthusiasm for the engineering team.
We are pleased to extend an offer for you to join our engineering team as a Software Engineer. Details will be sent to your email.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed eagerness to finalize details and move forward.
You have officially accepted our offer to join the engineering team. We are excited to welcome you aboard.
Your onboarding process has started with access to company systems and introduction to the development team and resources.
The recruitment case for your hiring as a Software Engineer is now closed. Welcome again to the engineering department.
